# rightMargin

**Type Property**

The right margin of the document.

## Declaration

```swift
static let rightMargin: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
```

## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing a float, in points.

The string constant in macOS 10.3 and earlier is `@"RightMargin"`.

## Getting document appearance keys

- **appearance**: The appearance of the document.
- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the document.
- **bottomMargin**: The bottom margin of the document.
- **defaultFontExcluded**
- **defaultTabInterval**: The default tab stop interval for the document.
- **excludedElements**: The HTML elements to exclude in generated HTML.
- **hyphenationFactor**: The hyphenation factor of the document.
- **leftMargin**: The left margin of the document.
- **paperMargin**: The paper margin of the document.
- **paperSize**: The paper size for the document.
- **prefixSpaces**: The number of spaces for indenting nested HTML elements.
- **textLayoutSections**: The layout orientations for each section.
- **topMargin**: The top margin of the document.
- **viewMode**: The view mode.
- **viewSize**: The view size.
